title: Can you guys help me get the new zoe skin please?
body:
I want to buy the new Zoe skin but I don't have 13rp to purchase, could you guys help me getting the skin please? 
Thank you riot   {{champion:142}}

replies.body:
Player support will sometimes offer you a once off small sum of RP (under 50) if you make them an art of some sort. 

Examples here: http://rpart.riotgames.com/na/en/

It's up to the agents discretion though, so don't feel like it's a guarantee
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.
where do i have to submit :(
